wikipedia_page.main: Gary John Poole (born 11 September 1967) is an English former professional footballer who played as a right-back. He made more than 250 appearances in the Football League, and a further 76 in the Conference.

response: : Release: June by Gold Key Comics. Writer: Gary Poole. Artist: Win Mortimer.

In only his fourth game in his second spell at Rotherham, versus Plymouth Argyle on 13 March 1993, Buckley fractured his skull in a clash of heads with Gary Poole. He required emergency surgery to remove a blood clot from the brain
